plot: After dozing off while working late on a presentation, a young professional endures a chain reaction of unfortunate events brought about by his oversleeping.
title: The Early Worm
plot_es: After dozing off while working late on a presentation, a young professional endures a chain reaction of unfortunate events brought about by his oversleeping.
plot_en: After dozing off while working late on a presentation, a young professional endures a chain reaction of unfortunate events brought about by his oversleeping.
